page.title: 08Shouldham-Village activities
page.content:
{Play Group:}This meets three times a week, in the Village Hall, during term time. There are a large number of under fives attending and much effort has gone into providing equipment. The children spend most of their time in supervised play.
{Bowls Club:}Shouldham boasts a large and successful club which plays in many of the local and county leagues. A new Club house was built three years ago providing a bar and entertainment facilities. Many members come from the surrounding area and this is one of the best known clubs in the area.
